name: Rewind Rentals
description:
Rental Rewind is a game for the Brackeys game jam and when I saw the theme was Rewind the first thing that comes to my head is VHS tapes and when I think of tapes I think of movie rentals. I created a lite business sim with a first person view

You run the store by taking money from the customers and rewinding the returned tapes and putting them back on the shelf.

You can upgrade your VCR for faster rewind speeds and buy multiple VCR

You can buy more shelf space and buy more tapes for the shelves. And then work to unlock 2 more genres to make sure all customers find what they are looking for!

Coded and Design by Natedog769

3D models and texture by Jesus Fong-Kee

Music by Samy Taleb

2D Artwork by Matthew Stratford

Additional Help

Andrew Welsh and Logan Slater
